Class Server

java.lang.Object
Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Server extends Object implements Runnable
Create the server of minesweeper Provide field information from class @see Champ Create thread and communication with clients
Author:
ninod

    • sendCasetoAll

      public void sendCasetoAll​(int i, int j, int discov, int numThread)
      Send a case update to a player according to a received information
      Parameters:
      i - coord x champ
      j - coord y champ
      discov - statut reçu
    • 0 nothing
    • 1 open case
    • 2 mark flag
    • 3 remove flag
      • numThread - id du joueur ( = numThread) Send 201 start com code coord x and y num of the player who clicked on the case
    • 2010 mark flag
    • 0 value (useless)
      • or
    • 2013 remove flag
    • 0 value (useless)
      • or
    • 2011 bomb
    • 0 value (useless)
      • or
    • 2012 value case
    • value
      • Update score of the player who clicked on the case + 1 case discovered - 10 bomb activated

    • sendScoretoAll

      public void sendScoretoAll()
      Send the score of every player to each player Code 202 (communication score) number of player Loop on player player num score of the player
